summary:
Just replacer for Lydia's appearance.
(Added Standalone Follower version!!)
You can choose face types from 2 versions (Lily ver, Rose ver)
and Protected to Essential.
descriptionHtml:
[b][i][color=#9900ff]     Hello guys. [/color]
[color=#9900ff]     This is simple mod.[/color]
[color=#9900ff]     Just replace Housecarl Lydia's appearance[/color]
[color=#9900ff]     and Protected to Essential. Nothing anymore.......[/color]

[color=#9900ff]     I made Two face types.[/color]
[color=#9900ff]     [/color][color=#3d85c6]Lily[/color][color=#9900ff] version and [/color][color=#a64d79]Rose[/color][color=#9900ff] version.
[/color]     [color=#ff00ff]CBBE,  UNP[/color]
[color=#9900ff]     You can choose only one file from them. 
[/color]     [color=#9900ff]Which one your fav? 

[/color]     [color=#ff0000][size=6]Attention!!!!!![/size]
[size=3]13/04/2016 Removed unnecessary files from Lydia replacer version.[/size][size=3]and now You can choose UNP and CBBE body types only.[/size][size=3]
[/size][size=3]If you need same body type as your character body, Just put your body meshes file to Meshes/[/size][size=3]actors/character/MyLydia/Body/character assets/[/size][size=3]and overwrire them with your meshes files.[/size][size=3]You need for it from your body meshes file section[/size][size=3]femalebody_0.nif [/size][size=3]femalebody_1.nif [/size][size=3]femalefeet_0.nif [/size][size=3]femalefeet_1.nif[/size][size=3]femalehands_0.nif [/size][size=3]femalehands_1.nif[/size][size=3]
[/size][size=3]If you use CBBE HDT body or Bodyslide, You should choose MyLydia CBBE version.[/size][size=3]If You use UNPB, UNPB BBP, SeveNBase or UUNP, you should choose MyLydia UNP version.[/size][size=3]
[/size][size=3]Good luck!![/size][/color]
    [color=#ff00ff][size=4] Now Standalone Follower version available.
    Plz check Optional file below. 
[/size][/color]    [color=#ff00ff] ( Only CBBE, UNP body types)
[/color]    [color=#9900ff] You can found her at upper floor(I mean 2nd floor) in Drgonsreach or somewhere..... lol
     Plz looking for her :P
[/color]     [color=#9900ff]Her skills, status are same as Lydia.[/color]
[color=#9900ff]    [/color]
[color=#9900ff]     You getting huge performance hit??? nvm ;P[/color]
[/i][/b]

[img]http://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/73380-0-1455702459.jpg[/img]

[img]http://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/73380-1-1455702459.jpg[/img]

[img]http://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/73380-0-1455797060.png[/img]

author: seanume0725

files.name: MyLydiaLilyCBBE
files.changelogHtml:
13/04/2016 Removed unnecessary files from Lydia replacer version.
and now You can choose UNP and CBBE body types only.

If you need same body type as your character body, Just put your body meshes file to
actors/character/MyLydia/Body/character assets/
and overwrire them with your meshes files.
You need for it from your body meshes file section
femalebody_0.nif
femalebody_1.nif
femalefeet_0.nif
femalefeet_1.nif
femalehands_0.nif
femalehands_1.nif

If you use CBBE HDT body or Bodyslide, You should choose MyLydia CBBE version.
If You use UNPB, UNPB BBP, SeveNBase or UUNP, you should choose MyLydia UNP version.

Good luck!!
